long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant QR Codes for Any URL or Text

Quickly create and share QR codes directly from your browser with this sleek, dark-themed extension. Perfect for marketers, educators, and anyone who needs to share links efficiently.

Key Features:
• One-Click Generation: Instantly create a QR code for your current webpage.
• Custom Content: Enter any URL or text to generate a custom QR code.
• Multiple Formats: Choose between 200x200, 400x400 PNG, or SVG.
• Dark Mode Design: Easy on the eyes, especially during late-night browsing.
• History Tracking: Quickly access your 20 most recent QR codes.
• Fast Download: Save your QR codes with a single click.
• Share to imgur.com with one click. 

Why Install?
• Save Time: Generate QR codes without leaving your browser or visiting external websites.
• Enhance Presentations: Quickly add QR codes to your slides or documents.
• Improve Marketing: Easily create QR codes for your promotional materials.
• Share Efficiently: Simplify the process of sharing links in physical spaces or across devices.

Whether you're a professional needing to share links in presentations, a teacher creating interactive materials, or just someone who loves efficiency, DarkMode QRCode Generator streamlines your workflow and enhances your browsing experience.

Install now and start generating QR codes with ease!
